content: That sounds like a wonderful idea. I was thinking, since I just participated in the Easter vigil service at my local church, where we lit the Paschal candle and renewed our baptismal vows, it would be great to incorporate a similar element of renewal and reflection into the welcome ceremony. Perhaps we could have a small bowl of water and a few sprigs of rosemary or lavender, and have participants symbolically wash their hands or sprinkle themselves with the water as a symbol of renewal and purification. What do you think?
